Eunice Paige🌻

text: Eunice was excellent! Friendly, personable, and arrived ahead of schedule-- which was very helpful since I had an early flight out of HSV. A very safe ride and we arrived on time. text:
If the taxi lady is available, she is  by far the best option in the Huntsville area.  She was very professional, prompt, personable,and with a very clean vehicle, in giving me a ride from Decatur to HSV.  Easily worth double the normal cab fair, but did not charge it.

Will be calling ahead to reserve her services in future trips through HSV.

Steve

name: Wegahta Tewolde
text: Rude driver. Didn't tell me there would be a $20 minimum until she arrived at my residence. And didn't even have a meter to track the distance I would be traveling.

resp.text: My apologies for not telling you about the $20 minimum. It was an honest oversight however. I did let you know before we began the trip. I am really not sure how I was rude to you since I waited for you even after you didn't answer me twice to let you know that I had arrived. You failed to state that I quoted you a Flat Rate charge of $30 for a Roundtrip to Wal-Mart that included Wait Time. However, you refused to agree to that FARE Cost & wanted to only pay $20. Since we could not agree on my stated cost you decided to leave out if my vehicle & go with contact another ride service.

name: Latoya Davis
text: I don't like her she's the worst anywhere she is so mean to me I'm on oxygen and it was taking me a little time to get in the car and she was really really really rushing me and it was making it hard for me to breathe and she said maybe if you lose weight it will not take you this long and she was looking at me like I was pathetic and pitiful she's pitiful please don't ride with her she is not good get someone else.she even called me nasty and disgusting please don't go anywhere with her and I used to stay with her and she treated me worst than the white folks treated me back in the slavery days no get

resp.text: Latoya Davis, I went over & above to help you in the time of your need. My heart went out to you due to your current health & living situation. How you can post a lie instead of the truth is less than acceptable. I sacrificed my own personal space, in order for the quality of your life to be better. For three days that I was able to assist you with transportation at no cost & a place to stay. May the Lord Jesus Christ be with you, forgive you, & cause you to treat others with kindness also consideration.

name: mirza ahmed
text: Great!!!!

name: Rachel
text: They were great. On time, clean, and kind. Easy to reschedule as well.

name: John Naegeli
text: We used Coastal Express between PNS and Orange Beach. Tommy picked us up on time for both arrival and departure with friendly and welcoming service.  They provided excellent customer service keeping us updated well in advance assuring us we were covered. Highly recommend Coastal Express on your visit to the Orange Beach area.

name: Francis Wendowski
text: Great experience from booking through pickups in both directions. We were coming from out of state and the ease of this transaction alleviated much of my stress booking for a party of 14 people ages 3 to 77 ---- will definitely book with Coastal Express again

resp.text: Thank you, Francis.  We enjoyed being a part of your family vacation. We look forward to seeing you again in 2022!

name: Jacob Miller
text: I used Coastal Express as part of a group/conference arrangement for travel between PNS and Orange Beach. My entire encounter with the company was completely positive - I was contacted to schedule my pickup, received reminders and updates via text about times and places to meet, and the drivers were not only on-time but actually a little early traveling in both directions.

name: Debi Verrill
text: Our driver was there to pick us up within 5 or so minutes of our leaving the airport, once we'd landed.  He was pleasant and helpful and the ride was nice without incident.  We would definitely use Coast Express again.  Thanks so much!

resp.text: Thank you, Debi! We appreciate the feedback and look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Hannaha Niles
text: Great experience! Driver was on time and very professional.

name: Cliff Stepp
text: Would highly recommend this company.  On time, very professional, great communication.  Driver Brian was very pleasant and the vehicle was clean.  Great experience.

resp.text: Cliff, thank you so much for the feedback.  We look forward to seeing you again.

name: Keali Myrick
text: We booked a driver earlier this morning around 9-9:15 after another service had cancelled on us. We had to leave our place by 10:00. They assured us it would be a fairly low rate, they would be on time to get us at 10:30 and everything was working out perfectly. We were in contact with the driver and everything. Then around 10:30 we received a phone call from them saying that there was a 6 passenger minimum, after I had already told them there was 2 of us when I booked the car, and told us there would be an up charge and would charge us $30 a person. To add on, they then informed us that our driver now wouldn’t be here until 11:30-11:45. This is poor customer service and they practically blamed us for the miscommunication and their faults in this process. We are just lucky we aren’t supposed to be heading to the airport! Not happy!

resp.text: Keali, we apologize for your booking experience and that our dispatcher quoted you an inaccurate price and pick up time initially.  We constantly work to meet our customers' expectations and apologize for falling short of yours.  We would appreciate the opportunity to regain your business.

name: Coastal Car Rental
text: Excellent service. Our customers use this service to bring them to rent cars and they are very dependable and honest. Recommend this service to everyone!

resp.text: Thanks for the review. We enjoy working with your car rental company.

name: Sam Brumberg
text: Dee was a great driver and conversationalist. She did a great job navigating, pointing things out, and was timely and professional.

resp.text: Thank you, Sam. We are happy that you enjoyed your ride.

name: Caroline Woods
text: Amazing service, amazing drivers, great southern hospitality couldn't ask for a better shuttle. I definitely recommend these people. Especially for an airport shuttle they are top dollar

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words!  We appreciate our customers so much!

name: Zack Seltzer
text: Kathy is the most amazing driver! Would recommend using them especially for hangout weekend!

resp.text: Thanks for the review. We strive to provide the most reliable and cost efficient service on the gulf coast.

name: Jade Goforth
text: Awful service! We were waiting for 2 hours and we keep calling and they said they were closer and close so we ended calling up canceling and getting another taxi service instead who came 10 mins later! Don't really recommend them.....

resp.text: The reviewer called our dispatcher at 8:51 p.m. and was told the company was pre-booked with a wedding  and bachelorette party until 10 p.m.  The reviewer agreed to wait until after 10 p.m. and then called our dispatcher at 10:11 p.m. and cancelled the request. The dispatcher told the reviewer at 10:11 p.m. the driver would be there in less than 5 minutes and the reviewer became rude and hung up the phone. The reviewer was made aware of the wait at the original phone call and agreed to wait. The reviewer was most likely inebriated and became  impossible to satisfy.

name: Tricia Pelkington
text:
The man who picked up the phone was obviously harried because they were in the middle of a rush but that does not excuse his total lack of basic customer service. He hastily answered my questions about rates and timing but essentially tried bullying me into a decision bc I wanted 5 seconds to mull it over and then he hung up on me.

It's kind of comical to think back on now. This man couldn't keep it together for a 2 minute phone call. Anyway, probably best to take your business elsewhere.

name: Savana Maxted
text: They have always been so friendly and have never let me down when I need a ride. I definitely recommend using Gulf Shores Taxi if you want friendly and affordable service!!!

name: Nicholas Crownover
text: This taxi service was prompt and on time Jeff was very professional and courteous.

name: Dean Joyner
text: Good driver

name: Alexandria Adams
text: Called to try and get a taxi ride, was going over details with friends and asked how long it will take to get to us, as we were looking at other ride services trying to find the fastest route. He cussed at me and hung up in my face. Went with lyft instead and had a much better experience

name: Erica Asble
text: Our driver was super nice, picked us up even though we were staying in the not so tourist part of town on a busy night. Give them a call first, and if there is a wait. I suggest to take it they we be there, and won't give you the "I'll be there in 15......" an hour later your still waiting...

name: Tommy Miller
text: Whatever man works customer service should be fired instantly. I didn’t know the address of where we were going and I asked for a second to look it up and he said “oh my god....” then hung up. Once Uber and Lyft reach this town, good luck.

text: Best taxi service in the area!!! These guys are AMAZING!!! They arrived with smiles and on time. Could not ask for better service. I HIGHLY recommend. I manage a hotel in the area and my guest and I always use Modern Taxi. We know we won't be disappointed. Thank you so much for always being there and providing top notch service! :)

Take us where we needed to go and very helpful the following day with recommending places to go and taking us there. Always on time. Her boyfriend is a driver as well and we enjoyed our time with!!! You guys are great! I HIGHLY reccommend them.

Brian was awesome. He was able to tell us where all the awesome places were in Gulf Shores. He picked us up from our condo,
Brought us to dinner, then to another bar and then home. Brian was nothing but pleasant to talk to the entire time. Such great customer service! Another plus is he is a retired serviceman! Support our veterans!

name: Katie Engle
text: Well, when my friend and I first called a very nice gentleman answered the phone and told us our cab would be at our hotel in 10 minutes. A half an hour went by and nothing- it had started to rain so we decided to call back and see if we could cancel because we were wanting to go the beach but it had started raining, plus he was 20 minutes late. The gentleman answered and said something along the lines of "yes you can cancel I totally understand! If you need a cab just call us back!" Then the next day my friend and I decided again to call this cab service and order another cab, well, wrong decision. The guy answered the phone again and was super nice, he told us our cab would be here in 45 minutes! So we got ready for the beach and headed outside to sit in front of our hotel and wait for him.. We should've waited inside (it's so hot here lol.) So anyway, it gets to be where he's 40 minutes late, so me and my friend are like "He's probably just in a ton of traffic let's just go wait in the hotel lobby!" So we sit there for probably an hour. (Yes I know, we should've just called a different service, but we had already ordered this one and I had felt bad because we had to cancel the day befores cab.) Anway, we called the service to ask about when he would be here because he was almost two hours late at this point, NO ANSWER. We kept waiting, we kept calling. NO ANSWER. At one point the phone had the busy signal which leads me to believe they were ignoring our phone calls. THIS CAB SERVICE NEVER SHOWED UP AND NEVER ANSWERED OUR CALLS. DO NOT USE THIS CAB SERVICE.

So I missed my flight because of the wrong estimated arrival time/lack of update. And I missed many important meetings with clients. Who is going to compensate my loss?

No warning, just left me stranded at the very last minute with no time to arrange another ride. If you need to get someplace on time (like the Chattanooga airport for a 6AM flight), I would look elsewhere

name: Bruce Clements
text: I have tried using these guys twice now, and it has been a disaster both times.  I am local in Chattanooga, so I know when I am being taken the long way, but it doesn't matter to these crooks.  I park exactly 2.2 miles from the airport on Shallowford Rd when I fly out .  I got a cab from the airport one evening , told the driver where we were going, and he acted like he didn't know where that was (he did), and as I was giving him directions, he intentionally took a wrong turn down 153, and then down I75N despite me asking repeatedly to turn around on Lee Hwy, and then got on Shallowford at Hamilton place, and drove all of the way back on Shallowford, all the while trying to act like he didn't understand what we were telling him.  Even when we were telling him to turn left or right, and would point and say, "turn left here?" and turn right at the same time.  He was 100% American, and English was his only language, he was just that shady.  The second time was two nights ago, three of us loaded our stuff into a cab, and when the driver found out where we were going, he said, "it's $5 per person, which is $5, $5, and another $10.  It's $20."  I said, "There are three of us, we are going two miles down a main highway with no traffic, and how does $5 times three make $20?".  He was kind enough to say, "It's $20, or you can get your stuff out".  We took Uber instead, and always will from now on.  Cab companies hate Uber because they are going to have a shred of common decency to stay in business now, and it's apparently something they cannot do.

Not me or anyone else I know will ever be using Mercury Cab, ever again.  Driver was obviously out to scam people.  It's a shame that Mercury has gone downhill so bad.  I guess Uber and similar companies have killed the taxi business, but it may be for be for the best after our last experience.  ** I wish there was a score lower than 1 star**

text: My husband rented a limo for our 25th anniversary. He wanted the night to be fabulous for us. When the limo came and we entered into the limo the car was disgusting. Apparently they had taken prom students over the weekend and our date was on Tuesday. It seems no one could clean the car between the the 2. The radio was broken the windows were all smeared up, glitter all over and the floors had mud on them. There was a knife with cake icing on it sticking out of the seat which in turn got icing on my dress. The driver was okay and drove very well  but the car was absolutely horrible. We were tempted to just cancel and drive ourselves but we had paid ahead of time and were afraid we wouldn’t get our money back.

name: Marianne McCarley
text: Tiger Limousine is the best service in the Auburn area. We've used them for years. Brett always takes care of us. He's courteous and always has an interesting story for us. Would recommend!

name: ADR ADR
text: This was my first and last time using them. They need to change their name because they definitely were NOT "on time"! I called on a Thursday to schedule a pick up for Friday morning at 8:30 AM to reach my destination at 9. The dispatcher said a driver would be there on time and I would reach my destination on time. He also said he would call me  back with estimated rates. Well, I never received a call back about the rates and by 8:47 on Friday the driver still had not shown (no calls from the company). I had to call to inquire about the driver and was told the driver was held up with another customer. Needless to say that I did not make the destination on time but I really don't fault the driver-- I fault dispatch because he knew I scheduled that ride and he did NOT send the driver "on time".

resp.text: I apologize for this incident and I will delve into what went wrong.  We have high standards and everyone is expected to perform at platinum levels.  I will find out what went wrong and correct it so this won’t happen again.  Thanks.

name: PAT CLEVELAND
text: My husbands RV broke down on him in Alabama while i was three hours away in Florida . He called AAA and they would not help him because it was any RV , Although we had been members for 30 years and I offered to pay cash . I called numerous places , no one could help as my poor husband was sitting on the side of the road with no idea of his location,meantime I am in Florida calling every transport place I could think of to no avail. By this time it was dark and I can not drive at night . By this time i am panicing . He could not rent a car because they would not take a debit card and he did not have enough cash on him. Last resort , I started calling Taxi services . The only one that answered  was On Time Taxi. They listened to my story and said they would be glad to help . To make a long story shot , they sent a kind young man named Michael to pick my husband and bring him to me in Florida , three hours away . I will forever be grateful to this company for their kindness and professional service and taking care of my husband Michael Price . Thanks again and God bless you all . Pat McCurdy

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Nowlin and I appreciate your kind words and your business.  Glad to have been of service to you.

name: Sheila Gaines
text: I really enjoyed using this service on today. The pickup was timely, the gentleman scheduling my service was courteous, the driver was pleasant and professional. I will use them as my number one transportation when in need.

name: Rahman Wooden
text: Great rates, professional drivers, client first attitude!  Use services for week long stay during 4th July vacation.

resp.text: Your business was greatly appreciated and all my drivers raved about your generosity towards them.  Don’t hesitate to call if and when you need our services and you are in the area again.

name: Carpe DM
text:
I had an early morning flight.  I called 2 other cab services that claimed to be 24\7.  Neither of those companies answered my call at 4:30 AM.

I called On Time and they not only answered my call, my rider picked me up in a towncar with in 20 minutes!

Best cab service I've had!

name: Rachel McManus
text: Just used On Time Taxi out of Montgomery Al airport.  They were extremely prompt and courteous!! Would definitely recommend!

resp.text: Thanks for the compliment and your feedback is greatly appreciated.  Glad to know you had a wonderful experience and if we can help you in the future don't hesitate to call.  Thanks.

name: Rich Martin
text: On Time Taxi arrived exactly as their company name implies. Friendly fast transportation service at its finest. I would recommend using them. Ask for Dennis.

name: Kadijah Washington
text: Called at 9:49 and didn't get picked up until 10:55 had to be to work at 11

resp.text: I’m sorry for the misfortune, but my driver called and didn’t get an answer.  When the driver cannot make contact, the ride is put on hold because he can’t make trips without first making contact with the rider.  Thank you.

name: Mrs. Tonya M Adam
text: Super helpful santos was making connections i didnt know existed! Thank you!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words and we are here whenever you need us.

name: Deante Johnson
text: Always a great ride, and they also like to get to know there customers, and they are also very funny and goofy.

name: dave nc
text: Actually was very impressed with service!!As a trucker and used many cabs in the USA,Impressed!!Thanks!!Will definitely use again when I'm in the area!!

resp.text: I'm glad you had a great experience riding with us.  We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you in the future when your journey brings you to the area.  Thanks once again from the bottom of my heart.  Safe travels trucker.

name: Mitch Norris
text: Great, friendly, on-time service. Good communications during the process.

name: Jamie Fehrenbach
text: I think they set us up to mug us.  Probably avoid these guys.

resp.text: Unfortunately when alcohol takes over, the brain tends to imagine things that aren’t happening and gives you courage that you don’t have.  Fortunately, I’ve never drank so I can’t realistically say what affects it has, only what I’ve witnessed.  As a retired 25 year Air Force vet, I’ve seen our brotheren go out and have one to many occasionally.  I reviewed the tape in the van and to put it plainly, if there superior were to see it, they will definitely be reprimanded.  I’ll just file this under to much of a good night on the town and apologize to my driver for your behavior and rude remarks.  I served our country well and I surely hope in the future you do a better job of representing us.  Thanks for your continued service and support.

name: Mitzi Little
text: Fast, friendly service and good prices. Thanks!

resp.text: I appreciate your compliment as well as your business.  If you are ever in need of service again, please don't hesitate to call.  I'm glad your experience with us was an enjoyable one and thank you once again.

name: JAIME SMILEY
text:
The cab driver was rude because of a misunderstanding, and exhibited poor customer services after hanging the phone up in my face. I will never use his services again. He also texts while driving, swerving in and out of lanes, and will take the longest way possible to make your can fair higher.
You're welcome.

resp.text: I'm sorry you had a bad experience, but you must elaborate on whatever experience you had.  But let me correct you on one thing.  Regardless  of what route the driver takes, the fare is the same.  Fares are based on taxifaredinder.com, so even if you are in traffic for an hour, we don't charge any more money and if he take a route that seem to be longer to you, the price is still the same.  Thank you in advance for your feedback and have a blessed day.

name: Santo Coleman
text: Number 1  Taxi in Montgomery and surrounding area

resp.text: Your business is appreciated and thanks for the kind words.  We at On Time Taxi understand that you have options regarding your transportation needs.  Given that, we appreciate your business and look forward to handling your transportation needs in the future.  Thanks.

name: Michael Stewart
text: I called these guys for a ride to the airport for my family with all our luggage. All though they couldn’t accommodate me at the time “ I was requesting a van early in the morning and they had prior obligations” he went out of his way to provide me with another service that helped us out. Thanks!

name: cindy whitaker
text: Great ppl and prices too

resp.text: Thank you Ms Cindy, I’m glad your ride was an enjoyable experience.  Hopefully in the future if you need transportation, you won’t hesitate to call.  Thank you and have a blessed one.

name: Nole Hater
text: Their drivers are always on time and always friendly!!!

resp.text: Thank you, and we pride ourselves on timelessness, cleanliness and customer service.  Thanks for your continued business.

name: Myiah Taylor
text: Been waiting for a cab over two hours and they've been giving me the run around , and would not give me a call back , WORST CABS EVER !!!! STILL CURRENTLY WAITING !!!

resp.text: I am sorry for your inconvenience and I apologize, but the driver told you that you had to prepay for your trip on trips after 12:00am.  But you said you will pay him when you get there.  Unfortunately, it doesn’t work like that during those hours.  So I sincerely apologize.

name: victoria floyd
text: Customer service was great he stayed in contact untill he arrived!!!!! Don't call any one but Dennis thanks so so much !!!!!!!!!

resp.text: Your kind words are definitely appreciated.  Please don't hesitate to call when and if you need our services again.  Thanks and have a wonderful day.

name: Shardanay Lee
text: Very poor service, waited almost two hours for a cab that never showed and was told that i have to pay the fair anyway total bs

resp.text: I'm sorry you had a bad experience and accept my sincere apologies, but since I started this company I've never missed a call.  If I couldn't do it, I would simply tell the customer to please try to find someone else because we can't do it for whatever reason.  On your particular incident, I told you it would be 25 to 30 mins and the person who called the cab for you knew that.  The driver got there and they said you left with your uncle.  You called later wanting a ride to McDonald's and I stated our policy is, if you don't  call and cancel your ride and leave, there is a $10 fee if you want us to continue servicing you.   I most certainly express my deepest regrets and look to serving you and the rest of the community.  We pride ourselves on customer service and strive to be nothing but the best.  Thanks and have a blessed day.

name: Santo Coleman
text: Number 1  Taxi in Montgomery and surrounding area

resp.text: Your business is appreciated and thanks for the kind words.  We at On Time Taxi understand that you have options regarding your transportation needs.  Given that, we appreciate your business and look forward to handling your transportation needs in the future.  Thanks.

name: Myiah Taylor
text: Been waiting for a cab over two hours and they've been giving me the run around , and would not give me a call back , WORST CABS EVER !!!! STILL CURRENTLY WAITING !!!

resp.text: I am sorry for your inconvenience and I apologize, but the driver told you that you had to prepay for your trip on trips after 12:00am.  But you said you will pay him when you get there.  Unfortunately, it doesn’t work like that during those hours.  So I sincerely apologize.

name: Jaela J.
text: Your driver may have company sitting in the front seat and isn't shy asking "do you smoke?" . The fares change depending on who the driver is!

resp.text: I’m sorry for the confusion about price, but you never get over charged, sometimes the driver may give you a discount.  But the next time before you move, you can get quoted an exact price so there’s no confusion.  Sorry for the misunderstanding.

name: Simply TheBest
text: Was on time and the vehicle was clean made me carry my own bags to the van 😒 only charged 20 to go 7 miles ☺ he offers a food delivery service called the next day to order some food charged me 15 bucks to bring my food from the less than a mile away taco bell😕 other than that I'd have used him all the time

name: SYDNII E (EMBRACING ME IGNORING YOU)
text: Will rip u off and manager will side with driver

resp.text: First off, my apologies for you having the impression of someone is trying to over charge you.  But we don’t have a $8.60 fare, the minimum fare is $10.  It sounds ludicrous for a fare to go up that much on just a return trip.  But if you want a taxi to wait for you, the meter continues to run and that’s what you encountered.  If you want the driver to leave and you call when you are finished handling your business, there is no wait time, and a minimum $10 fare coming back.  I’m not here to rip you or anyone else off.  And if you are short on cash, say that and we here at On Time Taxi will be more than happy to credit you a ride or work with you as best we can.  Have a blessed and prosperous holiday season.

name: Mz Queenkay32
text: A bunch of rip-offs!

resp.text: I’m sorry you feel like someone ripped you off, but I definitely wholeheartedly disagree with your assessment.  Now if you had a disagreement about price, you could have called and rectified the situation.  I’m sorry you feel this way and I apologize, but if you have something further on the matter, call the office and see if your problem can be solved.

name: Michael Cummings
text: I didn't end up using the services, but thd cab driver was very friendly and was very familiar with the area where I live. Seemed a little pricey.

name: Lori-Dawn Peavy
text: The dispatcher was very rude. And you have to wait 45 minutes to an hour for the taxi.

name: K Alt
text: Roman was amazing! He picked us up from the airport late on a Wed evening and delivered is to our hotel. He returned on Sunday to take us back to the airport. I would definitely call him again if we returned to Birmingham.

name: Alicia Davis
text:
They treated me very nice and didn't mind taking me where I needed to go. The driver was also very patient with me.
Thank you Silver Cab

name: Eduardo Avendaño
text:
I used this company and the driver Mr. Roman was very responsible and friendly. He pickup me in the hotel and bringme to the Birmingham airport , and when I back h was waiting for me and bringme back to the hotel. Always was on time
An excellent person.
I recommend 100%.

name: Calon DiPiero
text: Scheduled my early AM airport ride 2 days in advance to make sure I was all set. They confirmed with me the day prior. The morning of I called 3 times when no one arrived. Finally when I called they said none of their drivers were in the area and “ they didn’t know what happened” anyways I missed my flight. DO NOT RELY ON SILVERCAB. Unorganized unprofessional never showed and I missed my flight.

resp.text:
Hello, I hope all well. Did you really miss your flight from birmingham? Driver over slept. Our true apologies from all the Silver Cab team.
Is there anything we can do to to help?
Thank You

name: sherry Nicklaus
text: I wouldn't recommend silver cab to NOBODY AT ALL WHAT SO EVER!! I CALLED LAST NIGHT TO GET A RIDE AND THE DRIVER SOUNDED SO RUDE OVER THE PHONE AND ALSO WANTED TO CHARGE ME 30 DOLLARS FOR A RIDE THAT WOULD ONLY TAKE 7 MINS TO GET THERE. WHEN I CALL YELLOW CAB OR UBER THEU CHARGE ME 13 OR 14 DOLLARS ALWAYS. NOT 30!!!!

resp.text: Please call me at 205-585-0132 so we can make it up for you. If it was late hours and you are in a far area from birmingham then it was the minimum charge. If you are in Birmingham it should be the same rate as YC or Uber. Uber by the way charges 10 times of regular price when high demand. My apologies but call me so I can have more details PLEASE. Thank You...

name: Martha Hood
text: Great service love the drivers!

name: Caroline Morse
text: No cab available and no call back

name: DAVID CADWALLADER
text: On time driver was cool

name: Supa CG
text: Jeremy was phenomenal! I totally recommend using this service over an Uber or a Lyft!

name: Patrick Flavin
text: Prompt, courteous, responsive.

name: Canned Tuna
text: Best in birmingham

name: Yuva S
text: Must name this company the Birmingham mafia instead of silver cabs, ordered cabs for Monday am airport pick up and the confirmation person called me and asked for 200$ for a 4.8 mile ride from the hotel to the airport. This is not okay, please do not ride this cab. And the finishing words was “I’m just gonna do it for you though, that’s the rate”

resp.text: This is can not be true.

name: Karl Fleming
text: Lousey service

name: Lisa L
text: Great service! Scheduled a pick-up for a client and Sylvester called to let me know he was on time and let me know she was dropped off. Professional, a fabulous experience! Thanks guys!

name: Slique Vic
text: This is ok

name: Lee Tatum
text: They did an excellent job, I had to use them a half dozen times over about 5 days and they came right on time ever time. If they can't get to you right away they tell you that so you can make other arrangements and that's worth a lot, I have to say great service!!!

name: Kay Brannon
text: My Driver made me feel safe which is important and necessary for ladys on night flights. He was a great conversationalist as well.

name: Selim Masry
text: I absolutely love this company.  Very friendly service.  It was also cheaper than other taxi services I have used.  Their vehicles are always clean and it shows they take pride in the company.  I will always use them when I travel.

name: V.L. Jones
text: I love this cab company. Have used them many times. The drivers are personable and very courteous. Always there when expected. A very enjoyable experience.

resp.text: Thank You very much. We will continue to do the best we can.

name: Lois Duran
text: Seder with Silver cab was very professional. I called the day before to arrange early morning transportation to the airport. He provided his cell number in case I needed to get in touch with him. He called early the next morning to let me know he was on his way and he got us to the airport safely and timely. This was our first experience with Silver cab and we were very pleased. Thank you Seder!!

name: Malia Tartt
text: I SHOULD BE ABLE TO GIVE NO STARS! If you are a professional company and need to order transportation for your client, DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY! I would have used Uber, but they did not go out as far as I needed. We had an emergency and needed to provide our client with transportation immediately. I lined everything up with their dispatch, including payment. I was assured that a driver was dispatched out and our client would be at our office at the requested time. Then, no one showed to pick our client up. the driver claimed that he had tried to call our office multiple times, but we had no evidence of a call from him. Further, everything was lined up, so I just don't understand why you didn't just go pick the client up like we had agreed. I will NEVER recommend this company to anyone. STEER CLEAR!

resp.text: It hurt us to know that one of was not there to do the job just because he did not get an answer on the phone when he was on his way. We get customers who don’t answer their phone and usually end up on a no show. Our apologies and Thank You.

name: Lisa DuBose
text: Our cimpany has an account with Silvercab. Upon returning our rental car we called Silvercab and were told to walk down to find a cab...so we did just that.  The cab driver didnt want to take us even after we explained the person answering our call told us to come find him. Another cab driver pulled up and kindly took us..he was awesome and a very good driver..friendly and professional !!

resp.text: Thank You so much. You guys were wonderful, awesome and easy to deal with. My apologies for any inconvenience you had at the beginning. Best wishes...

name: e_ Leigh
text: Thanks !

name: John Perry
text: Had an early morning flight to the airport and they didn’t even show up. I called 10 minutes after the pickup time and was told they were on their way.... still a no-show. Ended up having to drive myself.

resp.text: Driver who did not show up is no longer with Silver Cab.  Our apologies Sir.

name: Louise Franklin
text: I needed transportation to the hospital for a 5:am scheduled early morning knee surgery. Jeremy in cab # 302 showed up 5 minutes before the scheduled pickup time. He was extremely helpful with loading my luggage and walker. He assisted me in getting all my stuff into the hospital and finding where I needed to go. I called him 2 days later to pick me up and take me home after the surgery and he was so nice, patient, and helpful. I have been using him to transport me back and forth to physical therapy since, he is always on time and very professional. I highly reccomend.

name: Alvinjoker420
text: Very friendly

name: Caroline Madison
text: No drivers

name: Tynes Sevier
text: Moe is a wonderful driver! I couldn't have asked for a better experience riding with him. He truly has been a blessing to me and a great driver who is safe and gets places on time right when I need him. Thanks silver cab and thanks Moe!

name: D James
text: Betty Jo is an excellent taxi driver for silver cab. She's always on time, and always a pleasure to be around. Never a dull moment.

name: Davis Campbell
text: Fantastic service and they are very quick. Michael was awesome. He was really friendly and helpful. He actually helped me close my broken garage door so I'll be sure to use this company in the future.

name: T. Lee Baumann
text: I love how you can reserve a cab ahead on the website, and Silver Cab calls you to verify the reservation...especially good for early morning rides to the airport. Masry was right on time (Cab #308). The cab was clean and didn't reek of smoke. Silver Cab has been my first pleasant taxi experience in Birmingham, AL and I've used them all. Thank you, Silver Cab...don't change anything!

name: Vincent Callaway
text: The driver Moe was excellent and his service was friendly. I recommend using them if your ever in Birmingham. You will receive top notch service and quality that you don't find in most companies today.

name: Jessica Hall
text: I will never be using this cab company in the future. If the driver of #309, on the morning of 03/18/2019, was any indication of Silver Cab's commitment to safety, I'll would just as soon walk. The cabby in #309 was impatient and reckless beyond belief. From speeding, to tailgating. Not even a courtesy turn signal. He nearly sideswiped several cars changing lanes. He ran one poor fella, in a black Nissan, off the road, attempting to change lanes and squeeze between two cars. The black Nissan got behind him and looked as though he was attempting to get a picture of his tag with his cell phone. When the Nissan would get close enough, the driver of #309 would slam his brakes and shoot a bird at him.... No.... Will never use this company...

resp.text: Sorry for the bad experience. I would be very upset as well. Driver 309 is no longer with us. It is one of the hardest businesses to know who is a good or bad driver until they work for the company. My apologies and Thank You.

name: Baron F
text: I first called Yellow Cab. The person on the line was rude and refused to help me because I was calling from an out of town area code. Silver Cab was the next call and should have been my first. Great to work with and on time. Yuri (my driver) was extremely friendly. I'll use them whenever I need a cab and I am in Birmingham.

name: Jennifer Kersh
text: I love this company, and have used them regularly to travel for work for years. my husband and mom also use them, never had any issues. they are always on time, professional, cabs are clean and the drivers are friendly.

name: Bettyjo Deslauries
text: I'm a driver for silver cab n this is a very responsible n dedicated company to b working for. Clean cabs n great drivers n the best boss ever. Hope u will ride with this company.. God bless..

name: Jessica Jackson
text: Mo was my driver and he is absolutely amazing! He is more than just a cab driver, but a friend! So happy with silver cab company, will definitely use them again. I would recommend them to anyone! Thank you for being so prompt and attentive to my needs.

name: J L
text: Mohammad was extremely polite and professional. His cab was impeccable. The ride was a great experience and I will go out of my way to utilize his service any time I am in the Birmingham area!

name: Todd Halcomb
text: This review is for Betty Jo. My experience with her was awesome. She was very friendly and respectful. She was early and waited on me. My trip even run longer than expected and she did not get upset. She made sure there would be a driver waiting for the other customer.

name: April Holderfield
text: This is for Mohammad Harb with Silver Cab Co.. I greatly appreciate you coming out of your way to come and get me and take me to the hospital today. It was truly a great experience. I highly recommend using Mohammad with Silver Cab.

name: Chelsey Gilliam
text: By far the best cab experience I've ever had in Birmingham or anywhere else in the country.  From the first phone call through several different pickups and drop offs, our driver Mike was incredibly prompt courteous and professional.  the extraordinary level of customer service made a special night all the more special for us.

name: Chris Stewart
text: I met the owner over 10 years ago and he has ALWAYS been 1st Class!  He is prompt, courteous, and a very safe driver!  I use their service about 5-7 times a month and have NEVER been disappointed!  I know that I will always use SILVER CAB!!

name: Masry Eastern food
text: Silver Cab actually KNOWS the area, will actually call and let you know how far they are from picking you up and show up on time!  Very reliable, very dependable and the level of service top notch!

name: Larry Elliott
text: Had an excellent experience with Silver Cab. Betty Jo was very professional. She was early and I was able to get to my appointment earlier than expected which was a plus. I will call her when I need a ride again.

name: Regis Ferrie
text: Seder was the most helpful driver I have ever death with.  We had a situation with our grandson that was out of town and needed to get to the bus station.  Seder went above and beyond the call of duty to make sure our grandson got on the bus to us safely and out of a terrible situation.  He made it happen!!  Would recommend this company to anyone!!!!

name: Joe Leal
text: Mohamaad runs an excellent company. He is very dependable and if he isn't available he assigns another driver no matter what time of day. He is always friendly respectful and upbeat. Best cab experience I ever had. I always use him.

name: Rosemarie Bates
text: JOHN CAR #301 is the BEST! He saved me and my job after Yellow Cab left me stranded. He was genuinely concerned about my situation and was there to get me pronto! When I called he was quick to respond and let me know down to the minute his arrival time. I have him saved in my contacts as The Best Taxi Ever because he is!! Thank you John!! You are an angel.

name: Tomiko Hudson
text: Greatest, Cab Ride ever.... I'm telling everyone to ride with Silver Cab... Friendly ,drivers ,clean cabs, great ride. A great day

name: Beverly Churchill
text: The waot was too long

name: Derek L
text: The absolute best in Alabama hands down! Always on time with a clean cab, vey honest and professional.

name: Collin Varner
text: Best cab service in Birmingham. After having numerous problems with Birmingham Yellow Cab, I reached out to the Silver Cab company which connected me directly with my driver as opposed to a dispatch. Mike, my driver, was very friendly and prompt in his arrival. His vehicle was clean, the meter was running (ensuring I received an honest fare), and he was respectable to me as a customer...which is unfortunately nothing I can say about many of the other cab rides I've received from other companies both in Birmingham or elsewhere.

name: Regina Hall
text: I came out the bus station Betty joe , was alert and ready , the other cab was parked but sleep she had her light on and ready. I didn't have to wait at the station at all. Pleasant right on time car smells good! Very nice decoration! I would love to ride again!!! Me and my son had a awesome ride!

name: Nancy Dyson
text: Car towed and stuck downtown in the rain at 9:30 on a Tuesday night.  I called Silver Cab, and the driver was there within 15 minutes and texted to let me know he was 5 min. away.  Jimmy was extremely helpful and courteous.  I would recommend to anyone!

name: Ashley JustMe
text: My first time taking a cab and using this company and I must say I was very very pleased with the service. Ethan was very nice, showed up to my house before time and got me to my destination way before time. Thank you silver cab. P.s. Ethan deserves a raise.

name: Rex Dove
text:
No stars for the no show!!!!
I needed to go see a friend before she left the place we frequent because she was moving to Texas in the morning and because of them I may never see my friend again!!
I called and automated service connected me to a driver I couldn't hear that hung up on me while I was saying I can't hear you
Thanx silver car for another dissapointment in life!! I'll never call again and I've heard good things about your company! The automated thing is no way to run a cab company!!!!

name: Shannon Retzbach
text: Thanks to my cab driver for being so friendly and professional. I made it to the airport with plenty of time to spare and enjoyed our friendly conversation. Thanks!

name: Troy Stafford
text: Great thanks for your prompt response and professionalism that characterizes your cab company. I'd truly recommend you to all who need a cab in Birmingham Alabama.

name: Rajendra Dangol
text: Birmingham's Best and well maintain Cab. I only use Silver Cab for  Ride.

name: Ashley Tippins
text: We loved Silver Taxi! We were picked up within 15 minutes on two different occasions. Our driver Mohammed was so courteous and friendly, and they gladly accept credit cards.

name: Daniel Caudle
text: Owner takes his company very seriously, and I appreciate that a lot.

name: Kathy Dutton
text: Had a great taxi ride with Clarence of Silver Cab! He was personable, efficient and a true ambassador for Birmingham. Excellent experience!

name: Motivated & Resilient
text:
I honestly recommend Mr. Mohammad Harb 👍👍

Mohammad was very professional and kind.
He helped me with my luggage and gave me ETA's to let me know how close he was.
Mohammad was on time, has such a happy personality, and I recommend him if you are looking for class, professionalism, and kindness.

Blessings to you Mr. Mohammad

As- Salamu alaykum
🙏

Peace,
Tiffany

resp.text: You are as well. Thank You so much Tiffany... Salam

name: Ashley Blanchard
text: There really is no reason to call any other cab company in Birmingham when you can call Mike with Silver Cab.  While on a business trip from NJ, Mike was timely, friendly, and made us feel right at home so naturally we continued to call him throughout our trip when we needed a cab.  Other companies in the area were not responsive, even hung up on me (AKA Yellow Cab) and it was a complete 180 having Silver Cab drive us where we needed to go.  He even delayed ending his own shift to make sure we got back to our hotel.  Do yourself a favor and call Mike, there really is no one better!

name: Patricia Taylor-Cooke
text: Don't try to schedule if you need an early pick up time. They told me to call someone else because they would charge me a fee for getting up early since I wasn't going very far. They didn't even care that I would need a return trip a few hours later. Guess they don't want or need my business.

resp.text: We found out which driver did that and he is no longer with Silver Cab. Thank You for your review.

name: kathy alfaro
text: I just had an emergency flight for my son last minute and I called silver cab and got BETTY a new driver and new to Birmingham area. She was not able to make it quickly but she swiftly made arrangements right away to get my son to airport on time versus just calling me back to let me know she couldn't make and he miss his flight. I have another son still in area and already plan to use Betty and others at silver cab as my GO TO for local and airport runs. Great job Betty!! My son is boarding his flight as I write this review!!! Glad u came on board w silver cab and know u will have many more reviews such as my own.

name: Byanca Jones
text: I called this morning and a guy took my phone number and he never asked for an address or nothing!!! I called back an hour later and no one knew what the hell was going on!!! Just horrible service all around! They even told me to call another cab service!!! So I did.

resp.text: Out apologies for any inconvenience this have caused you. Thank You.

name: Emilio Paschetto
text: I have been working with Cab #304 (Mr. Masry) that I highly recommend: always always punctual if not early on the appointment, very kind and educated, suggested good places and was always available... Perfect job thanks to him

name: Jamie Garza
text: Best taxi company ever! We are from Chicago my son's flight was delayed and the rental car company he had reserved closed. I called and they had a taxi there within minutes. Driver Ahmed I think he was #304 called to let me know he picked my son up from the airport and also texted me once he dropped him off at the hotel! (My son is 19 and on his first trip out of state alone for work). He went above and beyond

name: Ernest Chomicki
text: SO... I'm a Forensics/Debate Coach.  We were in Birmingham with my three students for Nationals and since I don't drive, we relied on cabs.  I can honestly say, that this company and especially Betty Jo pretty much saved our lives!  We got to our tournament high schools in excellent time, my students kept asking for her to pick us up since they always had such a fun experience with her, and this is important, when she couldn't make a run to come get us, she ensured that someone would!  I don't think I have EVER had that kind of excellent service from a cab company; definitely not here in Milwaukee, WI.  If you need dependability, and a pleasant experience, then this is the company to call.  Oh, and the price wasn't too bad either.

name: QWEEZY “QSI” H
text: This is officially my 50th time taking this amazing cab company. I used Silvercab to help me go through Hoover all the time. I was never denied, cabs always smelled wonderful and I've met every single cab driver in the roster,  and every single one has a unique personality that makes me look away from my phone just to admire it.

name: Gregg Mitchell
text: Sucks

name: Philip Barbour
text: I was turning in a rental at a business on 3rd Avenue South and needed a cab to take me home. The Silver Cab reviews looked promising and so I called. The automated recording said my call would be transferred to a driver. It was. I gave the gentleman the address where I needed to be picked up. Everything was fine until I told him my home destination address on Red Mountain. Suddenly the driver became a dispatcher and said, "we have no drivers in your area."  Really?  No drivers in the downtown Birmingham vicinity?  He thought it was just going to be too short a fare and suggested I call Yellow Cab. I did. I tipped $10 on a $10 fare. That disregard for me ensures I will never call Silver Cab again.

text: Betty Jo was my driver and she is awesome. I would definitely recommend them. Thanks.

text:
Once I let it go, twice I have to rate.

4am pickup means, at my house at 4am. Does not mean text me at 4am that you are on your way? ?
For normal operating hours 7am-6pm they are probably ok, not early mornings, unreliable.

resp.text: Would you please provide us with the silver cab number or the name of the driver? If not can you please describe the driver. I hate that you had a bad experience with silver cab more than once. My apologies for any inconvenience this may have caused you. I promise you we will improve our service next time to all customers because of people like you who deserve better service. Thank You. Harb. Owner of silver cab.

name: Stephanie Wilson
text:
As a visitor to Birmingham, I relied on the natives for feedback regarding services for early transport to the airport. Despite the good reviews for Silver Cab, they insisted that taxis in the city are universally unreliable. Cabs simply don't show up, they said. Inconvenience your friends; do whatever it takes to avoid cab service, because you would be lucky for them to arrive an hour after the scheduled time.

I was so relieved to experience Silver Cab as an exception. When I first called to schedule the pick-up, no one answered, which honestly didn't leave a great first impression. And even after they called back to take the request, I wasn't convinced they would ever show. But luckily Rob texted 30 minutes before the pick-up to let me know he was on his way and arrived 10 minutes early. The ride was pleasant, driver polite, and cab clean, but most importantly Silver Cab exceeded expectations by simply arriving on-time.

I hope the word spreads that Silver Cab is, indeed, a reliable transport option in Birmingham!

name: Shane Rathel
text: Betty Jo is awesome!. Betty Jo never showed back up........Now we don't have a ride....

resp.text: Thank You

text: Betty jo awas great! I eas surprised that a woman was coming to get me which made me feel safe so late  at night.  She warm friendly and interesting.  I recommend her anytime!

name: Scott Vandenberghe
text:
SO many problems- last time I don’t use Uber.

Landed in Birmingham and decided to try a taxi since they were right there.  Took a 5 minute trip that cost me $20.  It was a $16.50 fate but he had no change.   What cabbie doesn’t have change?. That fare used to be $12 or $6 with a recent uber.

The cab was smelly (not being picky here-it stunk), window wouldn’t roll down to offer any help, heat was blasting (it was 65 outside), driver didn’t offer help with bag, rude, etc, etc, etc.

I wil never use a cab again. I should’ve known.

resp.text: Are you sure it was a Silver Cab? Please call us for more details about the driver 205-585-0132. It was 30 degrees here last night.

name: Tricia R.
text:
Absolutely fabulous cab service.  When others (Yellow Cab) wouldn't pick us up, they did!  The cab was one of the cleanest I used and I would highly recommend.

BTW, Yellow Cab - The WORST cab service in Birmingham!  I stayed at the Sheraton Birmingham and even thought they have a sign out front for their services, don't bother.  They have no working knowledge of the area and are too bothered to show up.

Silver Cab actually KNOWS the area, will actually call and let you know how far they are from picking you up and show up on time!  Very reliable, very dependable and the level of service top notch!

He regularly drives around in his own personal silver crown vic and company cab while he is off the clock and poses like he is on the clock and charges extra money on your tab!!!! And when you call him out on his driving all he says is chill out and if you ask why his meter is running he says it does not work! And when you're a regular cab rider and know the total of what your ride will be before hand, and ask why you've been charged extra he gets rude and makes crazy excuses and when you tell him you cant pay that amount because you only brought the amount you normally pay silver cab to go that distance, he will tell you he will take sexual payments to make up the difference of what you supposedly owe him!!!! I was a loyal silver cab customer but three times of ending up in the vehicle with this guy has caused me to changes companies of what cab i get in because this guy is a dangerous predator and drug addict and i refuse to be made feel the way he made me feel again!!!!! So disrespected!!! So violated!!!  I felt extremely uncomfortable and unsafe!!!!

resp.text: Ms. Berkey,  I am deeply grieved to learn of this behavior happening in a Silver Cab. text: I called a few taxi from the list i had gotten from google looking for quotes. I used his website link and although he was very busy he was able to manage giving me a quote. His price was as much as $30 cheaper than his competition. He very much earned this 5 star review because he made it clear that every customer is worth best service. Im sure he always wants to give us his lowest fare possible so if you can, show love and tip if you can

Not only was the taxi driver rude over the phone when checking on the status but was also entirely off from his quote time. Honestly if you have other options I would recommend Bayside taxi as a last option.

name: Vanessa Steinkamp Norfleet
text: I had to use Bayside often after being released from the hospital while not able to drive. Overall the service was excellent. The drivers arrive in a timely manner and are courteous. As to be expected, some drivers exceed others in their willingness to open a door, help you get in and out, etc. The two stellar driver's, for my experience, were Tom and Danny. Both are exceptional people and good drivers. I will continue to use Bayside but will ask if either Tom or Danny are available first. Thank you, Bayside, for being prompt, courteous and helpful in my time of need.

name: Brooks Foley
text: Great service! Great drivers & receptionist & very friendly! On time every time!

name: Arthur Fryzel
text: Showed up when i needed you guys in half the time.

name: Appledroplarry
text: Outrageous rates. Gouging. Avoid this company.

resp.text: Our metered rates are on file and regulated by the Alabama Public Service Commission.  The meter is there to prevent gouging.  We do not alter our rates or add hidden fees.

name: Jason Crum
text: Driver was friendly and courteous with a very nice clean minivan. Service was very timely. I will use this service again. The automated phone service could be a little more informative, but was very impressed with our overall experience.

name: Lashaune 538
text: I called a day in advance to schedule a pick up in Mobile, AL. The scheduled pick up time was for 7am on Monday to the airport. There was no car dispatched. I had to call several times to find out where the car was. The customer service rep finally told me dispatch was not responding to them. The lack of professionalism, honesty and integrity speaks volumes. Why not be honest and say we will not have anyone available to pick you up. The CSR’s have no empathy nor do they try to resolve any problems. The driver who came and had to speed to get me to the airport was great. He also said dispatch is a problem. Why is this service still available in Mobile? They serve no purpose and someone else who genuinely wants to have a great car service can. I would not recommend this company/service to a 2 leg dog trying to get home from the vet.

name: Anna Fillingim
text: My mother, who cannot walk and does not get to go to the doctor often due to the high prices and unreliability of wheelchair accessible transportation, was delighted to book Z Trip to take her to the doctor today, 4/8/2021. She booked the trip days ago and had a confirmation number confirming the trip for 1:45PM. Today, without any notice at all, nobody shows up. She has to contact them to ask why nobody showed up at the time she booked. They tell her there isn’t a wheelchair accessible van available right now. How is that so when she booked a trip with a wheelchair accessible van for 1:45 days ago? When you book something, that usually means it’s reserved. Especially when you get a confirmation number. My mother had to miss her doctor appointment and who knows when she’ll be able to get back in or who will even take her reliably. I wouldn’t recommend  Z Trip to anyone.

name: Matt Raymundo
text: Says 24/7 service but never has cabs early in the morning literally waited for an hour and they just kept saying they’re checking the dispatch and still no one would get here they couldn’t even get me a wait time

name: Mary Fillingim
text:
I had a very important dr appt and called on Tuesday to set up my trip for Thursday, April 8. I booked a wheelchair accessible van and was given a confirmation for 1:45 pick-up.  At 1:35 I call to see if he’s on his way and they relay a message that they do not have a wheelchair van available at that time, yet I have a booking and a confirmation number, the customer service person says to call back in 15 min so I did at which time she says again call back in 15 min I said I have a doctor appt is this guy not showing I mean I booked this 2 days ago!!.I would not recommend Z trip
If you want to get to where your gong.  I never heard anything else from them. I wouldn’t
ever use these people after calling 6 times to see if they were coming she just kept saying wait 15 and call back I said I gotta get to the doctor. No one ever showed and I’m charged for a miss appointment.
